description:
Melodie is a portable, simple-as-pie music player


Features
• ui: improves usage on mobile and updates dependencies
• core, ui: final tweaks for v2
• core, ui: web broadcast
• ui: includes album artists in artist list, display in tracks tables
• core,ui: secures broadcast with TOTP
• core,ui: uses jwt to secure accesses
• ui: improve play on mobile
• core: adds more audio formats

Bug Fixes
• ui: images are broken after JWT has expired
• ui: improves player's stablility
